description:
The PostgreSQL Global Development Group has unveiled PostgreSQL 17, the latest iteration of what is widely-regarded as the world’s most advanced open-source database. This release marks a significant milestone in the database’s evolution, bringing substantial performance enhancements and new features that cater to both emerging and established data management needs. PostgreSQL 17 builds upon its... Read more »

The post PostgreSQL 17 delivers a leap forward for open-source databases appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: PostgreSQL 17 delivers a leap forward for open-source databases
